bibl.title: Plagued by Doubt: Reconsidering the Impact of a Mortality Crisis in the 2nd c. A.D.
bibl.note: The severity of the Antonine plague requires demonstration. The magnitude of the epidemic cannot be ascertained from indirect (papyrological, epigraphical, architectural, etc.) evidence.
GREENBERG James, Plagued by Doubt: Reconsidering the Impact of a Mortality Crisis in the 2nd c. A.D.
